text: The Bermuda Championship is a professional golf tournament on the PGA Tour that debuted in October/November 2019 as part of the 2020 season. The tournament is played at the Port Royal Golf Course, designed by Robert Trent Jones, in Southampton Parish, Bermuda. It is designated as an alternate event, opposite the WGC-HSBC Champions. The prize fund in 2019 was US$3,000,000.
